1424430.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Dungeon Alphabet
1424430.description:
The Dungeon Alphabet

An A-to-Z Reference for Classic Dungeon Design
Designing dungeons is as easy as A, B, C! The Dungeon Alphabet compiles classic dungeon design elements in one place to assist the game master in creating subterranean challenges.
A is for Altar, B is for Books, and C is for Caves: The Dungeon Alphabet has advice, hints, and randomized tables that bring new life to your adventures. Suitable for any rules system, the entries are accompanied by outstanding art from classic fantasy illustrators such as Russ Nicholson, Jeff Easley, Erol Otus, Jim Holloway, Peter Mullen, Stefan Poag and Brad McDevitt.
Author:
Michael Curtis
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Brett Gibson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
